summary.summary: 1 white plastic item reported. The incidence of plastics reported was 0,3% (n=296)
summary.reference: Romeo, T., Peda, C., Fossi, M. C., Andaloro, F., & Battaglia, P. (2016). First record of plastic debris in the stomach of Mediterranean lanternfishes. Acta Adriatica, 57(1), 115-124

summary.summary: 5 plastic items reported, where 40% was white, 40% was hyaline and 20% black. The incidence of plastics reported was 6,8% (n=73)
summary.reference: Romeo, T., Peda, C., Fossi, M. C., Andaloro, F., & Battaglia, P. (2016). First record of plastic debris in the stomach of Mediterranean lanternfishes. Acta Adriatica, 57(1), 115-124

summary.summary: 3 plastic items reported, where 33% were hyaline, 33% grey and 34% black. The incidence of plastics reported was 4,2% (n=71)
summary.reference: Romeo, T., Peda, C., Fossi, M. C., Andaloro, F., & Battaglia, P. (2016). First record of plastic debris in the stomach of Mediterranean lanternfishes. Acta Adriatica, 57(1), 115-124

summary.summary: 5 plastic fragments reported, where 40% was hyaline, 40% yellow and 20% brown. The incidence of plastics reported was 6,1% (n=82)
summary.reference: Romeo, T., Peda, C., Fossi, M. C., Andaloro, F., & Battaglia, P. (2016). First record of plastic debris in the stomach of Mediterranean lanternfishes. Acta Adriatica, 57(1), 115-124
